Class GifGridAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Gif>
        • com.kevalpatel2106.emoticongifkeyboard.internal.gif.GifGridAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adapter, Filterable, ListAdapter, SpinnerAdapter, ThemedSpinnerAdapter

    final class GifGridAdapter
extends ArrayAdapter<Gif>
    Created by Keval on 18-Aug-17. Adapter to display Trending GIFs in the GridView.
    Author:
    'https://github.com/kevalpatel2106'
